timeline.message: Changed the maximum length of display name and bio

timeline.bodyText: The current contract for dashpay only allows 20 and 140 characters.  Hopefully this is changed for the next network upgrade, but for now we need to use the smaller numbers otherwise the create/update profile items will fail.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
